entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
